txt.en:
'A short while ago, as the Elves would recount it, a copse of ancient trees stood here, but it seems that strange deeds have taken place that I cannot yet explain.

'Something has happened upon the hilltop. I fear that the Company may have encountered a powerful enemy; even the smallest clue could bring disastrous news to our enemies.  

'You must go and collect some of the charred remains and bring them here for me to study. You will find the charred wood lying upon the ground throughout the Burnt Tor.'
'It is as I feared: this wood was not burned by natural means. A word of command was used to light the fire that kindled this wood.'
'A powerful command was used to set the Burnt Tor ablaze.'
'Have you found the charred wood yet, [placeholder]? I am sure that it can be found in abundance upon the Burnt Tor behind me.'
Ruidhriel has asked for your aid in confusing the events of the Burnt Tor.
Charred wood can be found on the Burnt Tor, west of Ruidhriel.\n\nRuidhriel has asked that you gather charred wood for her to study in hopes of finding out what happened there.
